info.title: Azure Site Recovery Management Service API
info.description: A first party Azure service enabling the data replication.

get.description: Gets the details of the Replication fabric agent.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.
Tracking URL for long running operation.
Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of Replication fabric agents in the given fabric.

200.description: Returns Dra Model Collection on success.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the Replication fabric agent.
Gets the details of the Replication fabric.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of Replication fabrics in the given subscription.

200.description: Returns Fabric Model Collection on success.

get.description: Gets the list of Replication fabrics in the given subscription and resource group.

200.description: Returns Fabric Model Collection on success.

get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the Replication fabric.

get.summary: Get a list of REST API supported by Microsoft data replication.
get.description: Gets the operations.
Gets the details of the Replication policy.

get.description: Gets the list of Replication replication policies in the given vault.

200.description: Returns Policy Model Collection on success.

get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the Replication policy.
Gets the details of the Replication protected item.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.
Tracking URL for long running operation.

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to do force delete or not.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of Replication protected items in the given vault.

200.description: Returns ProtectedItem Model Collection on success.

get.summary: Gets the protected item operation status.
get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the Replication protected item.
Gets the details of the Replication extension.

200.description: Returns Replication extension Model on success.

put.description: Creates the Replication extension in the given vault.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

patch.description: Updates the Replication extension in the given vault.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

delete.description: Deletes the Replication extension in the given vault.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of Replication extensions in the given vault.

200.description: Returns Replication extension Model Collection on success.

get.summary: Gets the replication extension operation status.
get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the Replication extension.
Gets the details of the Replication vault.

get.description: Gets the list of Replication vaults in the given subscription.

200.description: Returns Vault Model Collection on success.

200.description: Returns Vault Model Collection on success.

get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the Replication vault.

code.description: Gets or sets the error code returned by the service.

message.description: Gets or sets error Message returned by the service.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the value of next link.

instanceType.description: Gets or sets the instance type.

machineId.description: Gets or sets the machine Id where Dra is running.

machineName.description: Gets or sets the machine name where Dra is running.

authenticationIdentity.description: Gets or sets the identity details used for authentication.

resourceAccessIdentity.description: Gets or sets the identity details used for resource access.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant Id of the SPN with which Dra communicates to service.

applicationId.description:
Gets or sets the client/application Id of the SPN with which Dra communicates to
service.

objectId.description: Gets or sets the object Id of the SPN with which Dra communicates to service.

audience.description: Gets or sets the audience of the SPN with which Dra communicates to service.

aadAuthority.description: Gets or sets the authority of the SPN with which Dra communicates to service.

name.description: Gets or sets the operation name.

status.description:
Gets or sets the status of the operation. ARM expects the terminal status to be one of
Succeeded/ Failed/ Canceled. All other values imply that the operation is still running.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the end time.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description:
Gets or sets the type of identity that created the resource: user, application,
managedIdentity.

lastModifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description:
Gets or sets the type of identity that last modified the resource: user, application,
managedIdentity.
